title: Why do people think that Vayne is toxic?
body: Or even OP? Yes her W has no counterplay, that's true (frozen heart says hi), her laning phase sucks, worst laning phase in the game, her range sucks too. She is toxic because she has to attack u with autoattacks??? Ofc that she has to do that cause she is an ADC. You like ezreal more that can burst u down only by casting spells? Or Draven that can kill u with 1 AA.
